homeTile_customGame_title: Host or Join a Custom Game
popupMe_warn_notRegistered: Sign up to save your progress and customize your profile.
popupMe_warn_notVerified: You've been sent an Email to verify your Email address. Once your Email is verified, you'll receive a free gift.
popupChangeName_message: Choose a new username for your profile. This name will appear to other players. You have %% name changes remaining.
popupEditStatus_message: Choose a status for your profile. This status will appear to other players.
popupEmail_label: Enter your current password to change your Email.
popupEmail_warn: Make sure your Email is reachable. We don't send spam and we don't share your information with anybody.
popupPassword_label: Enter your current password and your new password to change it.
popupPassword_warn: Make sure your password has a good mix of upper and lowercase letters. Don't tell anyone your password!
popupPassword_validation_passwordLength: Please enter a valid password. Must be at least 8 characters long.
popupSettings_language_warn: You must reload the page for the changes to take effect.
popupRegister_validation_passwordLength: Please enter a valid password. Must be at least 8 characters long.
popupRegister_validation_passwordMatch: Please enter a valid password. Must be at least 8 characters long.
popupRegister_label: Enter a valid Email and password. You can change your username once your account is created.
popupRegister_warn: The progress from your current session will be saved to your new account.
